common_0047_mama_01:
Oh, just look at you! All ready for your big
first day![npcn:2B]
common_0047_head_teacher_01:
Yes, the uniform of our storied academy suits you
quite well indeed.[npcn:A]
common_0047_head_teacher_02: Oh, gracious. How very careless of me.[npcn:A]
common_0047_head_teacher_03:
[BD06:0]I had entirely forgotten that I’ve something else
for you, M[aster;iss:g] [trnm:0].\r
A most\r
important\r
thing.[npcn:A]
common_0047_head_teacher_04:
But your living room is hardly the place for it.
Would you care to follow me outside?[npcn:A]
common_0047_mama_02:
I wonder what this important thing might be...
Let’s follow the director out and see, shall we?[npcn:2B]
